moves.name: Thunder Punch
moves.effect: Has a very small chance of leaving the target paralyzed.

moves.name: Race You!
moves.effect: Sharply raises the user’s Speed. Raises the user’s critical-hit rate.

moves.name: Wild Charge
moves.effect: The user also takes 20% of the damage it dealt to the target.

passives.name: Wide Awake
passives.description: Prevents the Pokémon from falling asleep.

passives.name: Standfast 3
passives.description: Reduces recoil damage received from using moves that have recoil in the effect tag.

passives.name: Power Reserves 2
passives.description: Powers up moves in a pinch.
